snippet: Hector Negroni, the head of municipal bond trading at Goldman Sachs, is leaving the firm to set up a new investment fund at Fundamental Advisors, the private equity firm said on Tuesday.
abstract: Hector Negroni, the head of municipal bond trading at Goldman Sachs, is leaving the firm to set up a new investment fund at Fundamental Advisors, the private equity firm said on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Goldman's Muni Chief Heads to Fundamental Advisors
